column4: for some reason while trying to install java I get a "ailed to fetch http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/t/tzdata/tzdata-java_2011k-0ubuntu0.11.04_all.deb 404  Not Found [IP: 91.189.92.188 80]" I am currenty running xubuntu 11.04
there's some tzdata legal issues recently, you may need to update
